name: Altium Designer Workspace File
summary: Learn about .DSNWRK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can view the projects stored in a DSNWRK file via the "Projects" panel in Altium Designer. In this panel, you can create a project group, access individual documents in projects, and add projects to project groups.
To create a DSNWRK file, select File → Save Project Group As in the main menu of Altium Designer. Or, you can right-click a location in the "Projects" panel, then click Save Project Group As.

description: A DSNWRK file contains information about a workspace created by Altium Designer, a CAD application used by engineers to design PCBs. It stores a group of Printed Circuit Board (PCB) projects (.PRJPCB files), which is especially helpful for users working on interconnected projects. DSNWRK files include design documents that make up each project with each document storing electrical component layouts.

instructions: You can only open DSNWRK files with Altium Designer. To open a DSNWRK file with Altium Designer, select File → Open Project Group. You can also right-click a location in the "Projects" panel, then select Open Project Group.
